content: So, @simulacrum and @Josh Triplett and I plan to continue with the "Backlog Bonanza" today (others welcome too). I was thinking though that as are starting to go forward with chartering project groups, it's definitely a good idea for us to also be looking over pending RFCs -- in particular, I would like us to be sure that we are chartering the right groups (i.e., if there are 4 good options, maybe one is clearly the best use of group time). I think right now we have a bit of a "local view".
Anyway, just a thought that has been bouncing around in my head lately.
